channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Long deep cracks in road surface, 24th September
item.description:
There are numerous long cracks along the road between Alstone and Dixton. This is one of the worst and as can be seen by the photo it is wide enough to ‘trap’ a bicycle wheel.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alderton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 24th September
item.description:
